channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: S&P 500 Hit in Worst Day Since ‘Post-Fed Tantrum’: Markets Wrap
item.description: A 1.5% slide in the S&P 500 Friday wiped out its advance in the nascent year.

item.description: The case exposes a flaw in Pennsylvania’s voter integrity rules that allows one person to have more than one vote.
